Title: Zero finally means zero
Body:
#### At **BastionZero, we are reimagining the tools used to manage remote access to servers, containers and clusters. Our tools make it easy to access, control, monitor and log shell access to targets in any datacenter or public cloud. Weâ€™ve developed a next-generation cryptographic security model that eliminates the single point of compromise that plagues existing remote access tools in the market. On top of that, we are building collaborative and interactive interfaces that will revolutionize the way engineers manage access to servers and containers.

* [How Bastion Zero works](https://github.com/bastionzero/whitepapers/blob/main/mrzap/README.md)
* [Try Bastion Zero](https://bastionzero.freshdesk.com/support/solutions/articles/67000684976-ssh-quick-start-guide)
* [Set up & FAQ](https://bastionzero.freshdesk.com)
* [Careers](https://apply.workable.com/bastion-zero)

###[Connect with Bastion Zero](https://www.bastionzero.com/#form)

#### [Bastion Zero](https://www.bastionzero.com) - Platinum Sponsor of [Conf42 DevSecOps 2021](https://www.conf42.com/devsecops2021)

Title: Quickly access any computing resource anywhere
Body:
#### **Teleport allows engineers and security professionals to unify access for SSH servers, Kubernetes clusters, web applications, and databases across all environments.

* [About Teleport](https://goteleport.com/about)
* [Get started with Teleport](https://goteleport.com/pricing)
* [Upcoming Events](https://goteleport.com/about/events)
* Teleport on [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC1O9RGv3FGJau091DD09ooQ)

Teleport has their own [Blog](https://goteleport.com/blog), a great read for all folks in the field!

#### [Teleport](https://goteleport.com) - Platinum Sponsor of [Conf42 DevSecOps 2022](https://www.conf42.com/devsecops2022)

Title: The End-to-End SRE Platform
Body:
#### **Blameless provides engineering teams with an end-to-end SRE platform that empowers teams to optimize reliability without compromising innovation velocity. By streamlining incident response, DevOps and SRE teams continuously learn, improve and stay resilient.

* [Try Blameless Now](https://www.blameless.com/try-now)
* [Schedule Demo](https://www.blameless.com/schedule-demo)
* [Blameless SLO 1-Pager](https://d6d4ismr40iw.cloudfront.net/event/547b9958-3374-4931-bb9e-f2d776583a2e/resources/blamelesssloonepager_v1.pdf?utm_campaign=TS-21Q3-Conf42%3ASRE&utm_source=Conf42-SRE&utm_medium=virtual-booth-slo-1-pager)
* Subscribe to Blameless on [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC1O9RGv3FGJau091DD09ooQ)

Make sure to check out the latest SRE article - [Elephant in the Blameless War Room: Accountability](https://www.blameless.com/sre/elephant-in-the-blameless-war-room-accountability?utm_campaign=TS-21Q3-Conf42%3ASRE&utm_source=Conf42-SRE&utm_medium=virtual-booth-blog-elephant-war-room)

Drawing! Win Beats Solo3 Headphones (wireless) in the free [Raffle](https://info.blameless.com/conf42-sre-raffle)!

#### [Blameless](https://www.blameless.com) - Platinum Sponsor of [Conf42 SRE 2021](https://www.conf42.com/sre2021)

Title: Build reliable and innovative software at scale
Body:
#### **Cortex is a Software Engineering Platform that helps engineering teams build higher quality software by providing them visibility into complex service architectures and giving them the tools required to establish a culture of service reliability and ownership, drive adoption of best practices, and accelerate developer velocity

* [Learn more](https://www.cortex.io/products/scorecard/?utm_source=conf42) about how Cortex helps teams establish best practices
* [Book a demo](https://www.cortex.io/demo/?utm_source=conf42)
* Case study: [How Clever standardized service quality across its 500+ services](https://www.cortex.io/case-study/clever/?utm_source=conf42)

Read about [how to improve your influence as an SRE](https://www.cortex.io/post/4-ways-to-improve-your-influence-as-an-sre/?utm_source=conf42)

#### [Cortex](https://www.cortex.io) - Platinum Sponsor of [Conf42 SRE 2021](https://www.conf42.com/sre2021)
